CustomField.description: Amount of time after DML occurs before Lightning LDV triggers should be executed. If the delay is 0 it will happen synchronously. If the delay is greater than 0, it will be scheduled for asynchronous execution.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount of time after DML occurs before Lightning LDV triggers should be executed. If the delay is 0 it will happen synchronously. If the delay is greater than 0, it will be scheduled for asynchronous execution.
CustomField.label: Trigger_Delay
